column4: hey there Ive just done another Dapper install on an MSI NForce motherboard and teh MCP51 ehternet controller is not behaving
the new dapper looked after the onboard nvidia graphics fine

when I run the downloaded NFORCE drivers from nvidia and run it as root the script first complains of cant find ld so I did a ln -s ld-static ld and then ran the nvidia installler again and it got past that error to only complain of not being able to find objcopy from bin utils
generally ntfs is mounted readonly by default
